title: The castel of helthe gathered, and made by Syr Thomas Elyot knight, out of the chief authors of phisyke ; whereby euery man may knowe the state of his owne body, the preseruation of helthe, and how to instruct well his phisition in sicknes, that he be not deceyued.
author: Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546.
publisher: In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress.,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
